summary: Jonsas are absolutely idiots. They are talking that Jon kills Dany because He is Azor Ahai. But... but... but love of his life...
body:
Jonsas are absolutely idiots. They are talking that Jon kills Dany because He is Azor Ahai. But… but… but love of his life is Sansa😂they can’t realize that if Sansa is love of Jon’s life he need to kill Sansa not Dany 😂

Have you ever seen more idiot people?

People without mind! People without Logic !


There is a firework of logic !

tags: who can understand who he has to rule
summary: The mare whickered softly as Jon Snow tightened the cinch. "Easy, sweet lady," he said in a soft voice, quieting her with a...
body:
The mare whickered softly as Jon Snow tightened the cinch. “Easy, sweet lady,” he said in a soft voice, quieting her with a touch. Wind whispered through the stable, a cold dead breath on his face, but Jon paid it no mind. He strapped his roll to the saddle, his scarred fingers stiff and clumsy. “Ghost,” he called softly, “to me.” And the wolf was there, eyes like embers.

—A Game of Thrones - Jon IX

Jon Snow, the guy who is supposed to like the warrior woman type, whispered to his mare “Easy, sweet lady”. He could’ve said “Easy, girl”, but he said: “Easy, sweet lady”. Oh Jon, you are such a romantic dork.  

…

So, appearently now the way an expert rider talks to his horse is a point to prove how Jon loves sweet behaviour instead of the warrior type of person….like someone who’s a warrior can’t be gentle…but…he is a warrior…and he is talking gently to his horse? So…LOL??? I won’t even discuss further the following points of the post cuz I think I said enough with this one 😂😂😂

tags: this post was inspired by jackoshadows post and aryainwinterfell's comment on it
summary:
some jonsa fans: Pffftttt jonrya is such a dead ship 😂😂 there is literally nothing left here for this ship anymore!!! 
also some...
body:
some jonsa fans: Pffftttt jonrya is such a dead ship 😂😂 there is literally nothing left here for this ship anymore!!!

also some jonsa fans:

  1. Use quotes that are specifically relevant to Jon and Arya’s relationship for their edits
  2. Dissect Arya’s storyline and give almost all of it to Sansa to write their 678905432th meta to prove how perfect she is for Jon
  3. Somehow equate Jon thinking about Arya to him being madly in love with Sansa
  4. Have this weird obsession with denying the fact that Jon and Arya were close.
  5. Get really touchy when someone points out that Jon literally died for Arya
  6. Are super excited about Jon becoming the future king of Westeros or the Lord of Winterfell( to the point of ignoring Bran and Daenerys’s storyline) but still think Jon to be lacking any sort of intelligence
  7. Deny that Arya actually has foreshadowings of being a queen in her storyline.
  8. Want her to be an emotionless bodyguard for Sansa or die alone in the west of westeros.
  9. Arya who is repeatedly said to share both physical and behavioural traits with Lyanna Stark ( Jon’s mother) is apparently nothing like her. Sansa is of course more like Lyanna than her sister.
  10. Finally shipping jonrya is blasphemy but there is nothing purer than Jonsa.

summary:
Imagine: Being stuck
at home with Jon Snow because of the weather.  A/N: It took everything in me not to call this “Imagine:...
caption:
Imagine: Being stuck at home with Jon Snow because of the weather.

A/N: It took everything in me not to call this “Imagine: Being snowed in with Jon Snow” lol

      “Good morning,” You smiled as Jon awoke from his sleep.  

      “Up already?”

      You chuckle, “You slept in.”

      He instantly jolts out of bed, “What?! Why didn’t you wake me? I have to g-”

      “No you don’t love, lay back down.” You pull the curtain back before he can protest, “We are completely snowed in, you can’t even get out of this house. We received a raven this morning saying the journey would be postponed until the snow clears up a bit.”

      “Really?”

      You nod, handing him the message that came in this morning. You drop down next to him and gently trail your fingers over his bare chest, “Until then, it’s just you and me.”    

      As you’re about to lean in for a kiss, his stomach growls, and you both burst into laughter, “Before we go any further, let’s take care of that first.”

End.

To be added or taken off a tag list, feel free to send me a message/ask.

Forever Tags: @nekodemon73 @2toastersbang @beahippie23 @addie-baby @hells-helvig @roseslovedreams @sebastianstanslefteyebrow @pinktrouble@killthe-illusionarydreams @all-by-myself98 @jaiboomer11  @m-a-t-91 @mimikyu-of-death @angels-and-things  @infinte-exist-ence@thisismysecrethappyplace @fandomnerdsarecool @bees-love-books

Game of Thrones: @disneyprincessbuffyannesummers

summary: The mare whickered softly as Jon Snow tightened the cinch. "Easy, sweet lady," he said in a soft voice, quieting her with a...
caption:
The mare whickered softly as Jon Snow tightened the cinch. “Easy, sweet lady,” he said in a soft voice, quieting her with a touch. Wind whispered through the stable, a cold dead breath on his face, but Jon paid it no mind. He strapped his roll to the saddle, his scarred fingers stiff and clumsy. “Ghost,” he called softly, “to me.” And the wolf was there, eyes like embers.

—A Game of Thrones - Jon IX

¡THIS QUOTE! 

I have so many things to say about this quote! Here is a summary:

  • Jon Snow, the guy who is supposed to like the warrior woman type, whispered to his mare “Easy, sweet lady”. He could’ve said “Easy, girl”, but he said: “Easy, sweet lady”. Oh Jon, you are such a romantic dork.  
  • Lady is also the name of Sansa’s direwolf.    
  • Lady and Ghost are mentioned together and linked in many passages of the Books. I love it.
  • At this point Lady is dead, so she is literally a ghost.
  • Later in the Books Jon also dies. So we have a direwolf with a dead master and a master with a dead direwolf.
  • And guess who is the female character that is called ‘sweet lady’ the most? Yes, the answer is Sansa. 

Art: ASoIaF - Jon Snow by Manweri

Art: ASoIaF - Jon Snow by Manweri

trail.content_raw:
The mare whickered softly as Jon Snow tightened the cinch. “Easy, sweet lady,” he said in a soft voice, quieting her with a touch. Wind whispered through the stable, a cold dead breath on his face, but Jon paid it no mind. He strapped his roll to the saddle, his scarred fingers stiff and clumsy. “Ghost,” he called softly, “to me.” And the wolf was there, eyes like embers.

—A Game of Thrones - Jon IX

¡THIS QUOTE! 

I have so many things to say about this quote! Here is a summary:

  • Jon Snow, the guy who is supposed to like the warrior woman type, whispered to his mare “Easy, sweet lady”. He could’ve said “Easy, girl”, but he said: “Easy, sweet lady”. Oh Jon, you are such a romantic dork.  
  • Lady is also the name of Sansa’s direwolf.    
  • Lady and Ghost are mentioned together and linked in many passages of the Books. I love it.
  • At this point Lady is dead, so she is literally a ghost.
  • Later in the Books Jon also dies. So we have a direwolf with a dead master and a master with a dead direwolf.
  • And guess who is the female character that is called ‘sweet lady’ the most? Yes, the answer is Sansa. 

Art: ASoIaF - Jon Snow by Manweri

  • And guess who is the female character that is called ‘sweet lady’ the most? Yes, the answer is Sansa.

blog.name: jackoshadows
blog.title: Jak O' the Shadows
blog.description: I’m not going to swear an oath I can’t uphold. Talk about my father if you want. Tell me that’s the attitude that got him killed. But when enough people make false promises, words stop meaning anything. Then there are no more answers - only better and better lies. And lies won’t help us in this fight - Jon Snow.

summary: Nothing annoys me more than seeing lines from the book of Jon thinking about Arya and Jon’s love for Arya and putting them on...
body:
Nothing annoys me more than seeing lines from the book of Jon thinking about Arya and Jon’s love for Arya and putting them on Jon-Sansa gifs to push Jonsa nonsense. It just goes to show how these guys have no hesitation in erasing Arya from Jon’s story and replacing her with Sansa.

The fact that there is no such thing existing between Jon and Sansa in the books, should tell one all they need to know about how much GRRM does not care about Jonsa

I can’t wait for all the Jon-Arya scenes next season where they unite and have cosy, emotional conversations and Arya helps Jon deal with his parentage. Maybe then these idiots will realize what an actual, affectionate relationship looks like compared to the constant bickering that we got with Jon and Sansa.

caption: 走過煉獄的女人 (Brimstone) - 這陣子狼師新聞在媒體上沸沸揚揚，不小心卻又看了這部與狼師有關的電影。只是此師非彼師，乃是引領羔羊的牧師。同樣利用權勢，牧師口中沒有文藝腔的甜蜜囈語，卻是僭稱來自天父的戒律教條。令人作噁的是，無論如何髮…http://blog.udn.com/jefnjil/102205485
